title: Miloš Miljanić
text:
Miloš Miljanić (; born 1960 in <a href="Belgrade">Belgrade</a>, <a href="People%27s%20Republic%20of%20Serbia">PR Serbia</a>, <a href="FPR%20Yugoslavia">FPR Yugoslavia</a>) is a <a href="Serbia">Serbia</a>n former <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> player.
He is manager of <a href="Alianza%20F.C.%20%28San%20Salvador%29">Alianza FC</a>.
Personal life.
Miloš is the son of former <a href="Real%20Madrid">Real Madrid</a> and <a href="Red%20Star%20Belgrade">Red Star Belgrade</a> manager <a href="Miljan%20Miljani%C4%87">Miljan Miljanić</a>.
